resources.string: This app is designed to take an incoming text message and vibrate the received message according to morse code.

In morse code you have letters, words, and sentences. Within each letter, there are dots and dashes (short and long pulses). Where the length of a dot is unit of time, a dash is worth three units of time. Between each dash and dot in a letter there is exactly one unit of silence. Between letters, there are 3 units of silence. Between words there are seven units of silence.
Developed by\n\tNeladri Bose, Dan Ciambrone, Patrick W. Crawford, Quentin Li, Tom Seidl\n
